SA26n3011:3: natvā sarasvatīṁ devīṁ śuddhāṁ guṇyāṁ karomyaham |
SA26n3011:29: kha pha cha ṭha tha ca ṭa tav | 11 |
SA26n3011:63: antyenetā sahita ādirmadhyagānāṁ svasya ca saṁjñā syāt |
SA26n3011:64: ya- thā'ṇiti a i u varṇānāṁ saṁjñā |
SA26n3011:70: uśca ūśca ū-iśca vaḥ kāla iva kālo yasya so'c kramād- hrasvadīrghapluptasaṁjñaḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:91: a i u ṛ eṣāṁ varṇānāṁ pratyekamaṣṭādaśa bhedāḥ |
SA26n3011:98: tālvādisthānamābhyantaraprayatnaścetyetaddvayaṁ yasya yena tulyaṁ ta- nmithaḥ savarṇasaṁjñaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:122: vivāraḥ saṁvāraḥ svāso nādo ghoṣo'ghoṣo'lpaprāṇo mahāprāṇa udātto'nudāttaḥ svaritaśceti |
SA26n3011:131: ka kha iti kakhābhyāṁ prāgardhavisargasadṛśo jihvāmūlīyaḥ |
SA26n3011:132: pa pha iti paphābhyāṁ prāgardhavisargasadṛśa upadhmānīyaḥ |
SA26n3011:140: ku cu ṭu tu pu ete uditaḥ |
SA26n3011:169: ikaḥ sthāne yaṇ syādaci saṁhitāyāṁ viṣaye |
SA26n3011:175: saptamīnirdeśena vidhīyamānaṁ kāryaṁ varṇāntareṇāvyavahitasya pūrvasya bodhyam |
SA26n3011:181: su dh y upāsya iti jāte |
SA26n3011:186: acaḥ parasya yaro dve vā sto na tvaci |
SA26n3011:197: saṁyogāntaṁ yat padaṁ tadantasya lopaḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:213: ecaḥ kramāday av āy āv ete syuraci |
SA26n3011:227: (12) yakārādau pratyaye pare odautorav āv etau staḥ |
SA26n3011:241: taḥ paro yasmāt sa ca tātparaścoccāryamāṇaḥ samakālasyaiva saṁjñā syāt |
SA26n3011:259: ṛ iti triṁśataḥ saṁjñettyuktaṁ tatsthāne yo'ṇ sa raparaḥ sanneva pravarttete |
SA26n3011:271: sapādasaptādhyāyīṁ prati tripādyasiddhā tripādyāmapi pūrvaṁ prati paraṁ śāstramasiddham |
SA26n3011:368: acāṁ madhye yo'ntyaḥ sa ādiryasya taṭṭisaṁjñaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:388: akaḥ savarṇe'ci pare pūrvaparayordīrgha ekādeśaḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:404: loke vede caiṅantasya gorati vā prakṛtibhāvaḥ padānte |
SA26n3011:440: dūrāt saṁbodhane vākyasya ṭeḥ pluto vā |
SA26n3011:497: saṁbuddhinimitaka okāro va pragṛhyo'vaidika itau pare |
SA26n3011:521: acaḥ parābhyāṁ rephahakārābhyāṁ parasya yaro dve vā staḥ |
SA26n3011:612: pañcamīnirdeśena kriyamāṇaṁ kāryaṁ varṇāntareṇāvyavahitasya parasya jñeyam |
SA26n3011:623: halaḥ parasya jharo vā lopaḥ savarṇe jhari |
SA26n3011:637: nādasya ghoṣasya saṁvārasya ma- hāprāṇasya tādṛśo vargacaturthaḥ |
SA26n3011:645: tad śiva ityatra dasya cutvena jakāre kṛte khari ceti jakārasya cakāraḥ |
SA26n3011:678: kvibante rājatau pare samo masya ma eva syāt |
SA26n3011:684: mapare hakāre pare masya mo vā |
SA26n3011:742: hrasvāt paro yo ṅam tadantaṁ yat padaṁ tasmāt parasyāco nityaṁ ṅamuṭ syāt |
SA26n3011:801: kavarge pavarge ca visargasya ka pau staḥ |
SA26n3011:869: bhos bhagos aghos iti sāntā nipātāḥ |
SA26n3011:902: manasratha ityatra rutve kṛte haśi cetyutve ro rīti lope ca prāpte |
SA26n3011:914: akakārayoretattadoryaḥ sustasya lopo hali natu nañsamāse |
SA26n3011:927: sa ityasya sorlopaḥ syādaci pādaścellope satyeva pūryeta |
SA26n3011:936: dhātuṁ pratyayaṁ pratyayāntaṁ ca varjayitvārthavacchabdasvarūpaṁ prātipadi- kasaṁjñaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:966: ṅyantādābantāt prātipadikācca pare svādayaḥ pratyayāḥ syuḥ |
SA26n3011:993: ekavibhaktau yāni sarūpāṇyeva dṛṣṭāni teṣāmeka eva śiṣyate |
SA26n3011:1033: yaḥ pratyayo yasmāt kriyate tadādi śabdasvarūpaṁ tasmin pratyaye pare'ṅgaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:1058: pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt paro yaḥ śasassastasya naḥ syāt puṁsi |
SA26n3011:1063: aṭ kavargaḥ pavarga āṅ num etairvyastairyathāsaṁbhavamilitaiśca vyavadhāne'pi raṣābhyāṁ parasya nasya ṇaḥ samānapade |
SA26n3011:1100: iti sthāni- vattvāt supi ceti dīrghaḥ |
SA26n3011:1145: iṇkubhyāṁ parasyāpadāntasyādeśaḥ pratyayāvayavaśya yaḥ sastasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ |
SA26n3011:1153: sarva viśva ubha ubhaya ḍatara ḍatama anya anyatara itara tvat tva nema sama sima |
SA26n3011:1157: tyad tad yad etad idam adas eka dvi yuṣmad asmad bhavatu kim |
SA26n3011:1200: eteṣāṁ vyavasthāyāmasaṁjñāyāṁ sarvanāmasaṁjñā gaṇasūcāt sarvatra yā prāptā sā jasi vā |
SA26n3011:1213: jñātidhanānyavācinaḥ svaśabdasya prāptā saṁjñā jasi vā |
SA26n3011:1223: bāhye paridhānīye cārthe'ntaraśabdasya prāptā saṁjñā jasi vā |
SA26n3011:1293: yādiṣvajādiṣu ca kapratyayāvadhiṣu svādiṣvasarvanāmasthāneṣu pūrvaṁ bhasaṁjñaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:1298: ita ūrdhvaṁ kaḍārāḥ karmadhāraya ityataḥ prāgekasyaikaiva saṁjñā jñeyā |
SA26n3011:1334: hrasvau yāvidutau tadantaṁ sakhivarjaṁ ghisaṁ- jñam |
SA26n3011:1375: antyādalaḥ pūrvo yo varṇaḥ sa upadhāsaṁjñaḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:1389: halantāt paraṁ dīrghau yau ṅyāpau tadantācca paraṁ sutisītyetadapṛktaṁ hallupyate |
SA26n3011:1394: prātipadikasaṁjñakaṁ yat padaṁ tadantasya nasya lopaḥ |
SA26n3011:1400: sakhyuraṅgāt paraṁ sambuddhivarjaṁ sarvanāmasthānaṁ ṇidvat syāt |
SA26n3011:1418: khitiśabdābhyāṁ khītīśabdābhyāṁ katayaṇādeśābhyāṁ parasya ṅasiṅa- sorata uḥ |
SA26n3011:1456: lukślulupśabdaiḥ kṛtaṁ pratyayādarśanaṁ kramāt tattatsaṁjñaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:1467: lumatā śabdena lupte tannimittamaṅgakāryaṁ na syāt |
SA26n3011:1502: dīrghājjasi ici ca pare na pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ |
SA26n3011:1562: śnupratyayāntasyevarṇovarṇāntasya dhātorbhrū ityasya cāṅgasyeyaṅuvaṅau sto'jādau pratyaye pare |
SA26n3011:1568: dhātvavayavasaṁyogapūrvo na bhavati ya ivarṇastadanto yo dhātusta- dantasyānekoco'ṅgasya yaṇajādau pratyaye |
SA26n3011:1677: dhātvavayavasaṁyogapūrvo na bhavati ya uvarṇastadanto yo dhātustada- ntaṁsyānekāco'ṅgasya yaṇ syādaci supi |
SA26n3011:1691: dṛnbhūḥ dṛnkarapunaḥ pūrvasya bhūvo yaṇ vaktavyaḥ |
SA26n3011:1837: varṇovarṇau striyāṁ vā nadīsaṁjñau sto ṅiti |
SA26n3011:1860: tisṛ catasṛ etayo rṛkārasya rephādeśaḥ syādaci |
SA26n3011:1915: iyaṅuvaṅoḥ sthitiryayostāvīdūtau nadīsaṁjñau na sto na tu strī |
SA26n3011:1925: iyaṅuvaṅsthānau stryākhyau yū āmi vā nadīsaṁjñau sto na tu strī |
SA26n3011:1995: jhalantasyājantasya ca klībasya num syāt sarvanāmasthāne |
SA26n3011:2000: acāṁ madhye yo'ntyastasmāt parastasyaivāntāvayavo mit syāt |
SA26n3011:2048: na lumate- tyasyānityatvāt pakṣe sambuddhinimitto guṇaḥ |
SA26n3011:2077: aṅgāvayavo'sarvanāmasthānaparo yo'n tasyākārasya lopo vā syā- nṅiśyoḥ parayoḥ |
SA26n3011:2146: dhātvavayavasyaikāco jhaṣantasya baśo bhaṣ se dhvepadānte ca |
SA26n3011:2157: (88) eṣāṁ hasya vā gho jhali padānte ca |
SA26n3011:2217: sāntasya vasvantasya sraṁsādeśca daḥ syāt padānte |
SA26n3011:2275: aci pare śaro na dve staḥ |
SA26n3011:2358: kiṁcit kāryaṁ vidhātumupātasya kāryāntaraṁ vidhātuṁ punarupādānamanvādeśaḥ |
SA26n3011:2372: nasya lopo na ṅau sambuddhau ca |
SA26n3011:2383: subvidhau svaravidhau saṁjñāvidhau kṛti tugvidhau nalopo'siddho nānyatra |
SA26n3011:2416: (96) ekājuttarapadaṁ yasya tasmin samāse pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya prātipadikāntanum-vibhaktisthasya nasya ṇaḥ |
SA26n3011:2422: ñiti ṇiti pratyaye nakāre ca pare hanterhakārasya kutvam |
SA26n3011:2466: nañā rahitasyārvannantasyāṅgasya tṛ ityantādeśo na tu sau |
SA26n3011:2501: ṣāntā nāntā ca saṁkhyā ṣaṭsaṁjñā syāt |
SA26n3011:2525: aṣṭabhya iti vaktavye kṛtātvanirdeśo jaśśasorviṣaya ātvaṁ jñāpayati |
SA26n3011:2544: aca dhātvadhikāre tiṅbhinnaḥ pratyayaḥ kṛtsaṁjñaḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:2554: kvin pratyayo yasmāt tasya kavargo'ntādeśaḥ padānte |
SA26n3011:2596: parāvupapade vrajeḥ kvip syāddīrghaśca padānte ṣatvamapi |
SA26n3011:2612: padānte jhali ca yaḥ saṁyogastadādyoḥ skorlopaḥ |
SA26n3011:2769: padāt parayorapādādau sthitayoḥ ṣaṣṭhyādiviśiṣṭayorvāṁnāvāvityā- deśau staḥ |
SA26n3011:2785: śrīśastvāvatu māpīha dattāt te me'pi śarma saḥ |
SA26n3011:2786: svāmī te me'pi sa hariḥ pātu vāmapi nau vibhuḥ ||
SA26n3011:2787: sukhaṁ vāṁ nau dadātvīśaḥ patirvāmapi nau hariḥ |
SA26n3011:2788: so'vyādvo naḥ śivaṁ vo no dadyāt sevyo'ca vaḥ sa naḥ ||
SA26n3011:2792: ete vāṁnāvādaya ādeśā ananvādeśe vā vaktavyāḥ |
SA26n3011:2794: dhātā te bhakto'sti dhātā tava bhakto'sti |
SA26n3011:2803: pācchabdāntaṁ yadaṅgaṁ bhaṁ tadavayavasya pācchabdasya padādeśaḥ |
SA26n3011:2894: sāntasaṁyogasya mahataśca yo nakārastasyopadhāyā dīrgho'sambuddhau sarvanāmasthāne |
SA26n3011:2919: ṣāṣṭhadvitvaprakaraṇe ye dve vihite te ubhe samudite abhyastasaṁjñe staḥ |
SA26n3011:2931: ṣaḍdhātavo'nye jakṣitiśca saptama ete abhyastasaṁjñāḥ syuḥ |
SA26n3011:3009: etaiḥ pratyekaṁ vyavadhāne'pi iṇkubhyāṁ parasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ |
SA26n3011:3042: (116) asya sambuddhau vā'naṅ nalopaśca vā vācyaḥ |
SA26n3011:3070: adaso'sāntasya dāt parasya udūtau dasya maśca |
SA26n3011:3079: adaso dāt parasyaita īddasya mo bahbarthoktau |
SA26n3011:3090: nābhāve kartavye kṛte ca mubhāvo nāsiddhaḥ |
SA26n3011:3302: avarṇāntāt paro yaḥ śaturavayavastadantasya num vā śīnadyoḥ |
SA26n3011:3315: śapśyanorāt paro yaḥ śaturavayavastadantasya num śīnadyoḥ |
SA26n3011:3518: śasprabhṛtayaḥ prāk samā- sāntebhyaḥ | am | ām |
SA26n3011:3554: sadṛśaṁ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu |
SA26n3011:3555: vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tadavyayam ||
SA26n3011:3557: āpaṁ caiva halantānāṁ yathā vācā niśā diśā ||
SA26n3011:3580: lakārāḥ sakarmakebhyaḥ karmaṇi kartari ca syurakarmakebhyo bhāve kartari ca |
SA26n3011:3590: (131) tiptasjhi sipthastha mibvasmas tātāñjhu thāsāthā- ndhvamiddhahimahiṅ | 3 | 4 | 78 |
SA26n3011:3615: svariteto jitaśca dhātorātmanepadaṁ syāt kartṛgāmini kriyāphale |
SA26n3011:3630: (133) labdhaprathamādisaṁjñāni tiṅastrīṇi trīṇi pratyekamekavacanādisaṁ- jñāni syuḥ |
SA26n3011:3710: liṭi pare'nabhyāsadhātvavayavasyaikācaḥ prathamasya dve sta ādi- bhūtādacaḥ parasya tu dvitīyasya |
SA26n3011:3737: jhaśāṁ jaśaḥ khayāṁ cara iti vivekaḥ |
SA26n3011:3772: tiṅ-śidbhyo'nyo dhātoriti vihitaḥ pratyaya etatsaṁjñaḥ syāt | iṭ |
SA26n3011:3884: upasargasthānnimittāt parasya loḍādeśasyānīti nasya ṇaḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:3913: ṅito lasya parasmaipadamikārāntaṁ yat tasya lopaḥ |
SA26n3011:4021: bhūsū etayoḥ sārvadhātuke tiṅi guṇo na |
SA26n3011:4043: hetuhetumadbhāvādi liṅ-nimittaṁ tatra bhaviṣyatyarthe lṛṅ kriyāyā aniṣpattau gamyamānāyām |
SA26n3011:4230: liṇnimittādeśādikaṁ na bhavati yadaṅgaṁ tadavayavasyāsaṁyuktahalma- dhyasthasyāta etvamabhyāsalopaśca kiti liṭi |
SA26n3011:4336: sanādayaḥ karmorṇaṅantāḥ pratyayā ante yeṣāṁ te dhātusaṁjñakāḥ |
SA26n3011:4375: dvitvanimitte'ci aca ādeśo na dvitve kartavye |
SA26n3011:4388: dānteṣu ad kṣud khid chid tud nud padya bhid vidya vinad vind śad sad svidya skandihadī ṣoḍaśa |
SA26n3011:4389: dhānteṣu krudh kṣudh budhya bandh yudh rudh rādh vyadh śudh sādh sidhya ekādaśa |
SA26n3011:4391: pānteṣu āp kṣip chup tap tip tṛpya dṛpya lip lup vapśapsvapsṛpastrayodaśa |
SA26n3011:4394: śānteṣu kruś daṁś diś dṛś mṛś riś ruś liśviśspṛśo daśa |
SA26n3011:4395: ṣānteṣu kṛṣ tviṣ tuṣ dviṣ duṣ puṣya piṣ viṣ śiṣ śuṣ śliṣ ekādaśaṁ |
SA26n3011:4397: hānteṣu d-h dih duh nah mih ruh- lihvaho'ṣṭau |
SA26n3011:4460: krādibhya eva liṭa iṇna syādanyasmādaniṭo'pi syāt |
SA26n3011:4465: upadeśe'janto yo dhātustāsau nityāniṭ tatasthala iṇna |
SA26n3011:4470: upadeśe'kāravān yastāsau nityāniṭ tataḥ parasya thala iṇna syāt |
SA26n3011:4475: tāsau nityāniṭa ṛdantādeva thalo neḍbhyāradvājasya mate |
SA26n3011:4497: ajantāṅgasya dīrgho yādau pratyaye na tu kṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ |
SA26n3011:4529: ebhyaḥ śyan vā kartrarthe sārvadhātuke pare |
SA26n3011:4587: dhusaṁjñakānāṁ māsthādīnāṁ ca etvaṁ syādhārdhadhātuke kitri liṅi |
SA26n3011:4611: upadeśe ejantasya dhātorātvaṁ na tu śiti |
SA26n3011:4622: dhumāsthāderanyasya saṁyogāderdhātorāta etvaṁ vārdhadhātuke kiti liṅi |
SA26n3011:4629: eṣāṁ sak syādebhyaḥ sica iṭ syāt parasmaipadeṣu |
SA26n3011:4665: (168) arteḥ saṁyogāderṛdantasya ca guṇo yaki yādāvārdhadhātuke li- ṅi ca |
SA26n3011:4698: asaṁyogapūrvasya pratyayokārasya lopo vā mvoḥ parayoḥ |
SA26n3011:5040: caṅpare ṇau yadaṅgaṁ tasya yo'bhyāso ladhuparastasya sanīva kāryaṁ syāṇṇāvaglope'sati |
SA26n3011:5083: iṇaḥ paro ya iṭ tataḥ pareṣāṁ ṣīdhvaṁluṅliṭāṁ dhasya vā ḍhaḥ |
SA26n3011:5144: vṛtādibhyaḥ pañcabhyo vā parasmaipadaṁ sye sani ca |
SA26n3011:5166: śaserdadervakārādīnāṁ guṇaśabdena vihito yo'kārastasya etvābhyā- salopau na |
SA26n3011:5185: eṣāmata etvamabhyāsalopaśca kiti liṭi seṭi thali ca |
SA26n3011:5249: śe yaki yādāvārdhadhātuke liṅi ṛto riṅ |
SA26n3011:5256: ṛvarṇāntāt parau jhalādī liṅsicau kitau stastaṅi |
SA26n3011:5348: ṣasya ḍhasya ca kaḥ syāt sakāre pare |
SA26n3011:5446: ad ṛ vyeñ ebhyasthalo nityamiṭ syāt |
SA26n3011:5502: tanu kṣaṇu kṣiṇu ṛṇu tṛṇu ghṛṇu vanu manu (190)
SA26n3011:5586: lugviṣaya uto vṛddhiḥ piti halādau sārvadhātuke na tvabhyastasya |
SA26n3011:5605: iha vṛddhirna bhāṣye picca ṅinna ṅicca pinneti vyākhyānāt |
SA26n3011:5694: vetterloṭyām guṇābhāvo loṭo lugloḍantakarotyanuprayogaśca nipā- tyate |
SA26n3011:5746: upasargeṇaḥ prādusaścāsteḥ sasya ṣo yakāre'ci ca pare |
SA26n3011:5821: upasargāt parasya iṇo'ṇo hrasva ārdhadhātuke kiti liṅi |
SA26n3011:5978: iksamīpāddhalaḥ parau jhalādī liṅsicau kitau stastaṅi |
SA26n3011:6050: bruvo la-ustibādīvāṁ pañcānāṁ ṇalādayaḥ pañca vā syurbruvaścāhā- deśaḥ |
SA26n3011:6135: acaḥ parāḥ saṁyogādayo nadarā dvirna bhavanti |
SA26n3011:6212: ebhyo liṭyām vā syādāmi ślāviva kāryaṁ ca |
SA26n3011:6312: vṛṅvṛñbhyāmṝdantācceṭo dīrgho vā syānna tu liṭi |
SA26n3011:6462: dārūpā dhārūpāśca dhātavo dhusaṁjñāḥ syurdāpdaipau vinā |
SA26n3011:6490: dviruktasya jhaṣantasya dhāño baśo bhaṣ tathoḥ sdhvośca parataḥ |
SA26n3011:6608: eṣāṁ kiti liṭi seṭi thali ca etvābhyāsalopau vā |
SA26n3011:6664: eṣāṁ saṁprasāraṇaṁ syāt kiti ṅiti ca |
SA26n3011:6914: abhyāsācceḥ kutvaṁ vā sani liṭi ca |
SA26n3011:6929: abhyāsasya śapūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante'nye halo lupyante |
SA26n3011:7166: uñchaḥ kaṇaśa ādānaṁ kaṇiśādyarjanaṁ śilamiti yādavaḥ |
SA26n3011:7198: ādiśabdaḥ prakāre tena ye'tra nakārānuṣaktāste tṛmphādayaḥ |
SA26n3011:7519: tṛhaḥ śnami kṛte im halādau piti |
SA26n3011:7908: stanbhvādayaśca- tvāraḥ sautrāḥ sarve rodhanārthāḥ parasmaipadinaḥ |
SA26n3011:8030: (254) ekāco grahervihitasyeṭo dīrgho na tu liṭi |
SA26n3011:8114: paranimitto'jādeśaḥ sthānivat sthānibhūtādacaḥ pūrvatvena dṛṣṭasya vidhau kartavye |
SA26n3011:8151: sani pare yadaṅgaṁ tadavayavābhyāsāta it syāt pavargayaṇjakāreṣva- varṇapareṣu parataḥ |
SA26n3011:8188: sannantasya yaṅantasya ca prathamasyaikāco dve sto'jādestu dvitī- yasya |
SA26n3011:8229: paunaḥ punye bhṛśārthe ca dyotye dhātorekāco halāderyaṅ |
SA26n3011:8244: gatyarthāt kauṭilya eva yaṅ na tu kriyāsamabhihāre |
SA26n3011:8282: (263) yaṅo'ci pratyaye luk syāccakārāt taṁ vināpi kvacit |
SA26n3011:8294: yaṅlugantāt parasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasyeḍvā syāt |
SA26n3011:8295: bhūsu- voriti niṣedho yaṅluki bhāṣāyāṁ na |
SA26n3011:8352: kyaci kyaṅi ca nāntameva padaṁ nānyat |
SA26n3011:8385: upamānāt karmaṇaḥ subantādācāre'rthe kyac putramivācarati putrīyati chātram |
SA26n3011:8396: (267) anunāsikāntasyopadhāyā dīrghaḥ syāt kvau jhalādau ca kṅiti |
SA26n3011:8426: ebhyo dhātubhyo nityaṁ yak syāt svārthe |
SA26n3011:8494: samo dāṇastṛtīyāntena yuktāduktaṁ syāt tṛtīyā ceccaturthyarthe |
SA26n3011:8500: sanaḥ pūrvo yo dhātustena tulyaṁ sannantādapyātmanepadaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:8536: kartṛge ca phale gandhanādau ca parasmaipadaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:8587: syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇorupadeśe'jjhanagraha- dṛśāṁ vā ciṇvadiṭ ca | 6 | 4 | 62 |
SA26n3011:8591: upadeśe yo'c tadantānāṁ hanādīnāṁ ca ciṇīvāṅgakāryaṁ vā syāt syādiṣu bhāvakarmaṇorgamyamānayoḥ syādīnāmiḍāgamaśca |
SA26n3011:8710: yadā karmaiva kartṛtvena vivakṣitaṁ tadā sakarmakāṇāmapyakarmakatvāt kartari bhāve ca lakāraḥ |
SA26n3011:8715: karmasthayā kriyayā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavat syāt |
SA26n3011:8752: vartamāne ye pratyayā uktāste vartamānasāmīpye bhūte bhaviṣyati ca vā syuḥ |
SA26n3011:8793: ātṛtīyāntaṁ ye pratyaṁyāste dhātoḥ pare syuḥ |
SA26n3011:8799: asmin dhātvadhikāre'sarūpo'pavādpratyaya utsargasya bādhako vā syāt stryadhikāroktaṁ vinā |
SA26n3011:8833: vidhervidhānaṁ bahudhā samīkṣya cāturvidhaṁ bāhulakaṁ vadanti | 1 |
SA26n3011:8872: śāsa upadhāyā it syādaṅi halādau kṅiti ca |
SA26n3011:8998: aduttarasyānavyayasya visargasya samāse nityaṁ sādeśaḥ karotyādiṣu pareṣu |
SA26n3011:9011: aruṣo dviṣato'jantasya ca mumāgamaḥ khidante pare na tvavyaya- sya |
SA26n3011:9024: svakarmake manane vartamānānmanyateḥ supi khaś syāt |
SA26n3011:9032: manin kvanip vanip vic ete pratyayā dhātoḥ syuḥ |
SA26n3011:9134: tatra tayoreveti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ktaḥ kartari kṛditi kartari ktavatuḥ |
SA26n3011:9138: (294) radābhyāṁ niṣṭhāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ | 8 | 2 | 42 |
SA26n3011:9142: radābhyāṁ parasya niṣṭhātasya no niṣṭhāpekṣayā pūrvasya dhātordasya ca |
SA26n3011:9166: aṅgāvayavāddhalaḥ paraṁ yat saṁprasāraṇaṁ tadantasya dīrghaḥ |
SA26n3011:9214: ghusaṁjñakasya dā ityasya dath tādau kiti |
SA26n3011:9238: aprathamāntena samānādhikaraṇe laṭa etau vā staḥ |
SA26n3011:9318: satukkasya chasya vasya ca kramāt ś ūṭh etāvādeśau staḥ kvau anunāsikādau jhalādau kḍiti ca |
SA26n3011:9378: (302) ete vartamāne saṁjñāyāṁ ca bahulaṁ syuḥ |
SA26n3011:9512: eṣāmupadhāvakārayorūṭh anunāsike kvau jhalādau kṅiti ca |
SA26n3011:9633: ivarṇovarṇopadhāddhalāde ralantāt parau ktvāsanau seṭau vā kitau staḥ |
SA26n3011:9679: ābhīkṣṇye dyotye pūrvaviṣaye ṇamul ktvā ca |
SA26n3011:9684: ābhīkṣṇye vīpsāyāṁ ca dyotye padasya dvitvaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:9695: eṣu kṛño ṇamul syāt siddhau'prayogo yasyaivaṁbhūtaścet kṛñ |
SA26n3011:9712: prātipadikārthamātre liṅgamātradyādhikye saṁkhyāmātre ca prathamā syāt |
SA26n3011:9789: anabhihite kartari karaṇe ca tṛtīyā syāt |
SA26n3011:9811: tena daityebhyo hariralaṁ prabhuḥ samarthaḥ śakta ityādi |
SA26n3011:9816: apāyo viśleṣastasmin sādye yaddhruvamavadhibhūtaṁ kārakaṁ tada- pādānasaṁjñaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:9868: (320) padasaṁbandhī yo vidhiḥ sa samarthāśrito bodhyaḥ |
SA26n3011:9873: kaḍārāḥ karmadhāraya ityataḥ prāk samāsa ityadhikriyate |
SA26n3011:9902: (322) vibhaktyarthādiṣu vartamānamavyayaṁ subantena saha nityaṁ samasyate |
SA26n3011:9933: adantādavyayībhāvāt supo na luk tasya pañcamīṁ vinā amādeśaḥ |
SA26n3011:9956: sahasya saḥ syādavyayībhāve na tu kāle |
SA26n3011:10030: dvitīyāntaṁ śritādiprakṛtikaiḥ subantai saha vā samasyate |
SA26n3011:10038: tṛtīyāntaṁ tṛtīyāntārthakṛtaguṇavacanenārthena ca saha vā prāgvat |
SA26n3011:10047: kartari karaṇe ca tṛtīyā kṛdantena bahulaṁ prāgvat |
SA26n3011:10056: caturthyantārthāya yat tadvācinā arthādibhiśca caturthyantaṁ vā prāgvat |
SA26n3011:10101: avayavinā saha pūrvādayaḥ samasyante ekatvasaṁkhyāviśiṣṭaścedavaya- vī |
SA26n3011:10121: dvitīyā tṛtīyetyādiyogavibhāgādanyatrāpi dvitīyādi- vibhaktīnāṁ prayogavaśāt samāso jñeyaḥ |
SA26n3011:10136: taddhitārthe viṣaye uttarapade ca parataḥ samāhāre ca vācye diksaṁ- khye prāgvat |
SA26n3011:10137: pūrvasyāṁ śālāyāṁ bhavaḥ pūrvāśālā iti samāse jāte |
SA26n3011:10148: ñiti ṇiti ca taddhiteṣvacāmāderaco vṛddhiḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:10151: pañca gāvo dhanaṁ yasyeti tripade bahuvrīhau |
SA26n3011:10157: go'ntāt tatpuruṣāṭṭac syāt samāsānto na tu taddhitaluki |
SA26n3011:10215: naikadhetyādau tu naśabdena saha sup supeti |
SA26n3011:10242: vigrahe yanniyatavibhaktikaṁ tadupasarjanaṁ na tu tasya pūrvanipātaḥ |
SA26n3011:10247: upasarjanaṁ yo gośabdaḥ strīpratyayāntaṁ ca tadantasya prātipadikasya hrasvaḥ |
SA26n3011:10260: saptamyante pade karmaṇītyādau vācyatvena sthitaṁ yat kumbhādi tadvācakaṁ padamupapadaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:10270: gatikārakopapadānāṁ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṁ prāk subutpatteḥ |
SA26n3011:10357: anekaṁ prathamāntamanyasya padasyārthe vartamānaṁ vā samasyate sa bahuvrīhiḥ |
SA26n3011:10362: (342) saptamyantaṁ viśeṣaṇaṁ ca bahuvrīhau pūrvaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:10386: uktapuṁskādanūṅ ūṅo'bhāvo yatra tathābhūtasya strīvācakaśabdasya puṁvācakasyeva rūpaṁ samānādhikaraṇe na tu pūraṇyāṁ priyādau ca |
SA26n3011:10396: (344) pūraṇārthapratyayāntaṁ yat strīliṅgaṁ tadantāt pramāṇyantācca bahuvrī- herap syāt |
SA26n3011:10397: kalyāṇī pañcamī yāsāṁ rātrīṇāṁ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ |
SA26n3011:10469: eṣviṇa uttarasya visargasya ṣo'nyasya tu saḥ |
SA26n3011:10493: anekaṁ subantaṁ cārthe vartamānaṁ vā samasyate sa dvandvaḥ |
SA26n3011:10607: ñiti ṇiti ca taddhite pare'cāmāderaco vṛddhiḥ syāt |
SA26n3011:10650: ṣaṣṭhyantāt kṛtasaṁdheḥ samarthādapatye'rthe uktā vakṣyamāṇāśca pratyayā vā syuḥ |
SA26n3011:10683: gotre yadyañantamañantaṁ ca tadavayavayoretayorluk tatkṛte bahutve na tu striyām |
SA26n3011:10690: vaṁśye pitrādau jīvati pautrāderyadapatyaṁ caturthādi tadyuvasaṁjñameva syāt |
SA26n3011:10695: yūnyapatye gotrapratyayāntādeva pratyayaḥ syāt striyāṁ tu na yuva- saṁjñā |
SA26n3011:10700: yūnyapatye gotrapratyayāntādeva pratyayaḥ syāt striyāṁ tu na yuva- saṁjñā |
SA26n3011:10710: pratyayādeḥ phasya āayan ḍhasyaiy khasya īn chasya īy ghasya iy ete syuḥ |
SA26n3011:10788: yādau taddhite'n prakṛtyā syānna tu bhāvakarmaṇoḥ |
SA26n3011:10842: bahuṣvartheṣu tadrājasya luk tatkṛte bahutve na tu striyām |
SA26n3011:10875: pūrveṇa vihitasya lup ṣaṣṭhidaṇḍātmakasya kālasyāvāntaraviśeṣa- ścenna gamyate |
SA26n3011:10903: saptamyantādaṇ syāt saṁskṛte'rthe yat saṁskṛtaṁ bhakṣāścet te syuḥ |
SA26n3011:10932: akṛdyakāre'sārvadhātuke yakāre cvau ca pare ṛto rīṅādeśaḥ |
SA26n3011:10955: iha bhasyāḍhe taddhita iti puṁvadbhāve kṛte |
SA26n3011:10992: (366) na yvābhyāṁ padāntābhyāṁ pūrvo tu tābhyāmaic | 7 | 3 | 3 |
SA26n3011:10996: padāntābhyāṁ yakāravakārābhyāṁ parasya na vṛddhiḥ kiṁtu tābhyāṁ pūrvo kramādetāvāgamau staḥ |
SA26n3011:11062: mavarṇāvarṇāntānmavarṇāvarṇopadhācca yavādivarjitāt parasya mato- rmasya vaḥ |
SA26n3011:11097: iha prakṛtiviśeṣādghādayaṣṭyuṭyulantā ucyante teṣāṁ jātādayo'rthaviśeṣāḥ samarthavibhaktayaśca vakṣyante |
SA26n3011:11195: (373) maparyantayoranayorekārthavācinostvamau staḥ pratyaye uttarapade ca parataḥ |
SA26n3011:11430: akṣairdīvyati khanati jayati jitaṁ vā ākṣikam |
SA26n3011:11693: cādbhāve jaḍasya bhāvaḥ karma vā jāḍyam |
SA26n3011:11929: dikśabdebhya ityataḥ prāgvakṣyamāṇāḥ pratyayā vibhaktisaṁjñāḥ syuḥ ||
SA26n3011:12043: idama eta it etau sto rephādau thakārādau ca prāgdiśīye pare |
SA26n3011:12061: eta it etau sto rephādau thādau ca prāgdiśīye |
SA26n3011:12103: kima edantāt tiṅo'vyayācca yo ghastadantādāmuḥ syānna tu dravyaprakarṣe |
SA26n3011:12239: prācuryeṇa prastutaṁ prakṛtaṁ tasya vacanaṁ pratipādanam |
SA26n3011:12273: vikārātmatāṁ prāpnuvatyāṁ prakṛtau vartamānādvikāraśabdāt svārthe cvirvā syāt karotyādibhiryoge |
SA26n3011:12279: akṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saṁpadyate taṁ karoti kṛṣṇīkaroti |
SA26n3011:12307: (411) dvyajavaraṁ nyūnaṁ na tu tato nyūnam |
SA26n3011:12310: ḍāci bahulaṁ dve bhavata iti ḍāci vivakṣite dvitvam |
SA26n3011:12312: ḍācparaṁ yadāmreḍitaṁ tasmin pare pūrvaparayorvarṇayoḥ pararūpaṁ syāt |
SA26n3011:12330: ajādīnāmakārāntasya ca vācyaṁ yat strītvaṁ tatra dyotye ṭāp syāt |
SA26n3011:12355: anupasarjanaṁ yaṭṭidādi tadantaṁ yadadantaṁ tataḥ striyāṁ ṅīp |
SA26n3011:12390: halaḥ parasya taddhitayakārasya lopa īti pare |
SA26n3011:12396: yañantāt ṣpho vā syāt sa ca taddhitaḥ |
SA26n3011:12455: yā pumākhyā puṁyogāt striyāṁ vartate tato ṅīṣ |
SA26n3011:12464: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasyākārasyekāraḥ syādāpi sa āp supaḥ paro na cet |
SA26n3011:12546: (420) pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya nasya ṇaḥ syāt saṁjñāyāṁ na tu gakāra- vyavadhāne |
SA26n3011:12555: jātivāci yanna ca striyāṁ niyatamayopadhaṁ tato ṅīṣ |
